itemLabel: Alan Howarth, Baron Howarth of Newport

wikipedia_page.main: Alan Thomas Howarth, Baron Howarth of Newport, CBE, PC, (born 11 June 1944) is a British Labour Party politician, and former Conservative Party politician, who was a Member of Parliament (MP) from 1983 until 2005. He is one of few politicians in recent years to have served as a minister in both Labour and Conservative governments, and is now a Labour life peer in the House of Lords.
